items.title: Queernorm Universes: Sci-Fi Books Where Homophobia and Transphobia Don’t Exist
items.description: These queernorm sci-fi books star queer main characters and are set in universes where transphobia and homophobia don't exist.

items.title: Ready to Fall in Love? Read These New Latine Romance Books
items.description: From a marriage of convenience to magical adventures, these new Latine romance books feature series entries and standalones, too.

items.title: 7 Recently Published Meta Mysteries
items.description: These seven recently published meta mysteries that will delight and surprise you as they play with the form in different ways.

items.title: An Immersive Memoir on Surviving a Dysfunctional Family
items.description: This tender, heartbreaking portrait of a dysfunctional family explores a topic rarely covered in media as anything other than spectacle.

items.title: Goods to Celebrate 20 Years of Twilight
items.description: Get ready for peak ~hoa hoa hoa hoa hoa~ season with these Twilight-inspired gifts, from décor and wearables to other bookish goods.
